scripts.dev:reset: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next\dev; $pids = netstat -ano | Select-String ':3000' | ForEach-Object { ($_ -split '\s+')[-1] } | Select-Object -Unique; foreach ($pid in $pids) { Stop-Process -Id $pid -Force }; exit 0" && next dev
scripts.start:bg: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$log='.next/start-3105.log'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force .next | Out-Null; $p=Start-Process -FilePath 'cmd.exe' -ArgumentList '/c npx next start -p 3105' -PassThru -WindowStyle Hidden -RedirectStandardOutput $log -RedirectStandardError $log; Set-Content .next/start-3105.pid $p.Id; Write-Output ('Started PID=' + $p.Id)"
scripts.stop:bg: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (Test-Path .next/start-3105.pid) { $pid=Get-Content .next/start-3105.pid; Stop-Process -Id $pid -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item .next/start-3105.pid -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output ('Stopped PID=' + $pid) } else { Write-Output 'No PID file' }"
scripts.logs:bg: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (Test-Path .next/start-3105.log) { Get-Content .next/start-3105.log -Tail 100 } else { Write-Output 'No log file' }"
scripts.npm:cache:reset: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .npm-cache\_cacache\tmp -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .npm-cache\_cacache\tmp -Force | Out-Null"
